roleset.name: diminish
roleset.note: WANE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wane' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Historically, "make wan" where "wan" is "pale" or "weak". Cool.Member of Vncls entity_specific_cos-45.5. (from wane.01-v)

example.name: only unaccusative
example.text: But interest waned as the day wore on and investors looked ahead to the release later this week of two important economic reports.
example.arg: as the day wore on and investors looked ahead to the release later this week of two important economic reports
